translated: The two [hands] holding a flayed human skin block the ears and the subject-object [duality] of sound.

original: rdo rje dang kha tv'am gas sna dang dri'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
analyzed: rdo rje dang kha tv'am gas sna dang dri'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
translated: The vajra and khaṭvāṅga block the nose and the subject-object [duality] of smell.

original: mdung rtse lnga dang zhags pas lce dang ro'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
analyzed: mdung rtse lnga dang zhags pas lce dang ro'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
translated: The five-pointed spear and noose block the tongue and the subject-object [duality] of taste.

original: dgra sta dang gri gug gis lus dang reg bya'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
analyzed: dgra sta dang gri gug gis lus dang reg bya'i gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
translated: The axe and flaying knife block the body and the subject-object [duality] of touch.

original: cang te'u dang drag po'i mgo bos yid dang chos kyi gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
analyzed: cang te'u dang drag po'i mgo bos yid dang chos kyi gzung 'dzin 'gegs so //
translated: The ḍamaru and skull block the mind and the subject-object [duality] of phenomena.

original: de'i bcom ldan 'das yum phag mo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: de'i bcom ldan 'das yum phag mo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The color and implements of the Bhagavatī Vārāhī are easy to understand, so I will not explain them.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni skye bo 'dod chags can gyi don du chos kyi dbyings kyi yum dang 'khyud pa ni thugs rdo rje chags pas rnam par rol pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni skye bo 'dod chags can gyi don du chos kyi dbyings kyi yum dang 'khyud pa ni thugs rdo rje chags pas rnam par rol pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat, for the sake of passionate beings, embraces the mother of the realm of phenomena, playing with the passion of the mind vajra.

original: spyi gtsug na rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can dpal he ru ka ni /
analyzed: spyi gtsug na rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can dpal he ru ka ni /
translated: Śrī Heruka has a crown of heads of the mind of enlightenment.

original: zhal dang po sngo skya g-yas ser ba rgyab dmar ba g-yon ljang ba steng dkar ba'o //
analyzed: zhal dang po sngo skya g-yas ser ba rgyab dmar ba g-yon ljang ba steng dkar ba'o //
translated: The first face is blue-green, the right is yellow, the back is red, the left is green, and the top is white.

original: mdun ma khro ba g-yas pa gzhang pa rgyab sgeg pa g-yon rngam pa steng zhi ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mdun ma khro ba g-yas pa gzhang pa rgyab sgeg pa g-yon rngam pa steng zhi ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The front face is wrathful, the right is laughing, the back is charming, the left is fierce, and the top is peaceful.

original: gtso bo la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlabs par bsgoms /
analyzed: gtso bo la phung po dang khams dang skye mched byin gyis brlabs par bsgoms /
translated: One should meditate on the consecration of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases in the principal one.

original: 'khor la yang phyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor la yang phyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should also meditate on the retinue later.

original: shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang du l'a ma dang / nub tu dum skyes ma dang / lhor gzugs can ma zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa khro mo drag po'i gzugs can dgod pa dang / mtshams bzhir bum pa'i steng du thod pa gzhag par bya ba ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad do //🔽gtso bo bskyed pa bsnyen pa /
analyzed: shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma dang / byang du l'a ma dang / nub tu dum skyes ma dang / lhor gzugs can ma zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa khro mo drag po'i gzugs can dgod pa dang / mtshams bzhir bum pa'i steng du thod pa gzhag par bya ba ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad do // gtso bo bskyed pa bsnyen pa /
translated: On the eastern petal is dakini, on the northern is Lāmā, on the western is Khaṇḍarohā, and on the southern is Rūpiṇī. They have one face and four arms, and their forms are wrathful and fierce, laughing. In the four intermediate directions, one should place skull cups on top of vases. Since this is clear in the tantra, I will not explain it.🔽Generating the principal one is the approach.

original: 'khor bskyed pa nye bsnyen /
analyzed: 'khor bskyed pa nye bsnyen /
translated: Generating the retinue is the close approach.

original: lus kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa sgrub pa byas nas sgrub pa chen po ni sngags dang phyags rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'khor lo bskyed pa sgrub pa byas nas sgrub pa chen po ni sngags dang phyags rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas /
translated: Having performed the accomplishment of the generation of the body wheel, the great accomplishment is the invocation of the gnosis being by means of mantra, mudra, and samadhi.

original: phyag bya ba dang bstod pa dang dbang bskur bar bsams nas bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag bya ba dang bstod pa dang dbang bskur bar bsams nas bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: Having imagined the homage, praise, and empowerment, one should remain.

original: dpral bar aom lkog mar a'a:snying gar h'um gsum las 'khor lo gsum bsgoms la /
analyzed: dpral bar aom lkog mar a'a:snying gar h'um gsum las 'khor lo gsum bsgoms la /
translated: Having meditated on the three wheels from the three syllables om, ah, and hum at the forehead, throat, and heart,

original: nu ma'i bar du he las ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgoms te dbugs 'byung rngub dang sbyar nas gsang sngags yid kyis bzlas pa bya ste sngags ni go sla'o //
analyzed: nu ma'i bar du he las ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgoms te dbugs 'byung rngub dang sbyar nas gsang sngags yid kyis bzlas pa bya ste sngags ni go sla'o //
translated: one should meditate on the gnosis wheel from he at the breasts, and perform mental recitation of the mantra in conjunction with the inhalation and exhalation of breath. The mantra is easy to understand.

original: lus kyi 'khor lo las khro bo'i sprul pa spros pas khams gsum gyi 'gro ba 'khor lo gsum gyi lhar rdzogs par byas nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi 'khor lo las khro bo'i sprul pa spros pas khams gsum gyi 'gro ba 'khor lo gsum gyi lhar rdzogs par byas nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: Having emanated wrathful emanations from the body wheel, one should perform the meditation and recitation of emanation and re-absorption, having perfected the beings of the three realms as the deities of the three wheels.

original: khams gsum ma lus pa kun sku gsung thugs kyi lhar bskyed nas ci bde bar bdud @158a * //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus pa kun sku gsung thugs kyi lhar bskyed nas ci bde bar bdud @158a * //
translated: Having generated all of the three realms without exception as the deity of body, speech, and mind, do whatever is comfortable.🔽

original: rtsi myang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / gtor ma gtang ba ji ltar bde bar byas la /
analyzed: rtsi myang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / gtor ma gtang ba ji ltar bde bar byas la /
translated: Having generated all of the three realms without exception as the deities of body, speech, and mind, one should enjoy the nectar, make offerings, praise, and give sacrificial cakes as one pleases.

original: bsgoms pa las ldang ba'i dus su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha gnyis bskon nas bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgoms pa las ldang ba'i dus su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha gnyis bskon nas bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: When one rises from meditation, one should don the two armors of the heroes and heroines and protect oneself.

original: de nas srid pa dang zhi ba'i dngos po thams cad snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yab yum gyi snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang lha mo rnams kyi sngags bkod pa la /
analyzed: de nas srid pa dang zhi ba'i dngos po thams cad snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yab yum gyi snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang lha mo rnams kyi sngags bkod pa la /
translated: Then, all things of cyclic existence and nirvana are arranged in the heart on a moon mandala, the essence and quintessence of the father and mother, and the mantras of the goddesses.

original: dbyi bas lha'i 'khor lo bsdu ba dang / de nas sngags kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sems la bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyi bas lha'i 'khor lo bsdu ba dang / de nas sngags kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sems la bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: The dissolution of the divine wheel is by the dissolution of the seed syllables, and then the mantras are dissolved into the mind as the factors of enlightenment.

original: sgrub thabs thams cad kyi lugs kyis sprul ba'i 'khor lo lus kyi dkyil 'khor sems kyi 'khor lo la bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: sgrub thabs thams cad kyi lugs kyis sprul ba'i 'khor lo lus kyi dkyil 'khor sems kyi 'khor lo la bsdu ba ni /
translated: The dissolution of the emanation wheel, the body mandala, into the mind mandala is the system of all the sadhanas.

original: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid // ces bya ba ste /
translated: Mantra, shape, and reality itself.

original: de thams cad du shes pas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyis spyod lam rnam pa bzhi la ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de thams cad du shes pas bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyis spyod lam rnam pa bzhi la ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand all of that, and abide in whatever way is comfortable in the four modes of action with the yoga of meditation.

original: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is taught as follows:

original: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga dang / dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang / rjes brgyad dang / thun mtshams kyi cho ga bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga dang / dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum dang / rjes brgyad dang / thun mtshams kyi cho ga bcu gnyis te /
translated: The five preliminary yogas, the three kinds of samādhi which are the main part, the eight subsequent [yogas], and the twelve rites of the session breaks—

original: sgrub pa'i thabs zhib mo rnam par 'thag par rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyis sgrub pa'i thabs bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs zhib mo rnam par 'thag par rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyis sgrub pa'i thabs bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the method of practice is to meditate on the method of practice with forty-eight [topics].

original: dman pa dbyibs bskyed rim /
analyzed: dman pa dbyibs bskyed rim /
translated: The inferior is shape, the creation stage.

original: zab pa sngags rdzogs rim /
analyzed: zab pa sngags rdzogs rim /
translated: The profound is mantra, the completion stage.

original: thabs rtsa rlung gi de kho na /
analyzed: thabs rtsa rlung gi de kho na /
translated: The method is the reality of the nāḍīs and vāyu.

original: mthar thug de kho na chos thams cad las byung ba ye shes kyi rim pa phyag rgya chen po don gyi gnas lugs so //
analyzed: mthar thug de kho na chos thams cad las byung ba ye shes kyi rim pa phyag rgya chen po don gyi gnas lugs so //
translated: The ultimate is the stage of gnosis that arises from all dharmas, mahāmudrā, the reality of the meaning.

original: le'u brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the eighth chapter of the tantra.

original: // / de ltar mngal la skyes kyi 'khor lo lnga bshad nas /🔽sgong skyes ston par bzhed pas byed pa mjug thogs kyi de nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: // / de ltar mngal la skyes kyi 'khor lo lnga bshad nas / sgong skyes ston par bzhed pas byed pa mjug thogs kyi de nas zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Having explained the five cakras of the womb-born,🔽now, in order to teach the egg-born, he says, “Then, immediately after the performance,” and so on.

original: gdul bya sgong skyes la dga' ba'i ngor de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: gdul bya sgong skyes la dga' ba'i ngor de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya'o //
translated: For the sake of those disciples who delight in the egg-born, he will now explain the egg-born.

original: de nas zhes bya ba tshad med pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / srung ba dang / tshogs sogs pa dang / stong pa nyid dang lnga sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'byung ba bzhi ri rab dang / sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba tshad med pa dang / byin gyis brlab pa dang / srung ba dang / tshogs sogs pa dang / stong pa nyid dang lnga sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'byung ba bzhi ri rab dang / sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la /
translated: Then, immediately after the generation of the five—the immeasurables, the consecration, the protection, the accumulation, and the emptiness—and the four elements, Mount Meru, and the variegated vajra cross,

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba ni brten pa lha'i dang po sbyor ba bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba ni brten pa lha'i dang po sbyor ba bsgom pa'o //
translated: now, in addition, he will explain the meditation on the union of the first deity, the supported.

original: dpa' bo gcig pas sgong skyes kyi tshogs ni /
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pas sgong skyes kyi tshogs ni /
translated: The assembly of the egg-born is the single hero.

original: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo'i ngo skal du rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo'i ngo skal du rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
translated: In the center of the celestial mansion, imagine the wind and fire maṇḍalas, which are the portion of the cakra.

original: de'i steng du @158b ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sna tshogs padma /
analyzed: de'i steng du @158b ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sna tshogs padma /
translated: Above that, there is a multicolored lotus of the wheel of pristine consciousness.

original: de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan /
analyzed: de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan /
translated: In its center is a seat of a sun maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du thong pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba'i phyed tshal /
analyzed: de'i steng du thong pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba'i phyed tshal /
translated: Above that is a half-moon filled with the elixir of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: de'i steng du a'a li lugs 'byung bcu drug dang / lugs bzlog bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis /
analyzed: de'i steng du a'a li lugs 'byung bcu drug dang / lugs bzlog bcu drug dang sum cu rtsa gnyis /
translated: Above that, there are thirty-two syllables: the sixteen syllables of the forward order of the Alikāli and the sixteen syllables of the reverse order.

original: gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / lce rtsa las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis dang / phus 'debs pa'i yi ge gnyis dang / tsheg drag las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis te /
analyzed: gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / lce rtsa las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis dang / phus 'debs pa'i yi ge gnyis dang / tsheg drag las byung ba'i yi ge gnyis te /
translated: There are thirty-four consonants, two syllables that arise from the tongue root, two syllables that arise from the nose, and two syllables that arise from the uvula.

original: yi ge drug gis bsnan pas gsal byed bzhi bcu lugs 'byung dang lcags bzlog gnyis kyis brgyad cu /
analyzed: yi ge drug gis bsnan pas gsal byed bzhi bcu lugs 'byung dang lcags bzlog gnyis kyis brgyad cu /
translated: Adding those six syllables, there are forty consonants.

original: dbyangs yig sum cu rtsa gnyis las mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi zla ba /
analyzed: dbyangs yig sum cu rtsa gnyis las mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi zla ba /
translated: The thirty-two vowels are the moon of the thirty-two marks.

original: gsal byed brgyad cu tham pa las dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu nyi ma /
analyzed: gsal byed brgyad cu tham pa las dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu nyi ma /
translated: The eighty consonants are the sun of the eighty adornments.

original: nyi zla kha sbyor gyi sgo da h'um gi khong par bam bcug pa'i byi'u phrug /'od zer spro bsdu /
analyzed: nyi zla kha sbyor gyi sgo da h'um gi khong par bam bcug pa'i byi'u phrug /'od zer spro bsdu /
translated: The door of the union of the sun and moon is the chick in the belly of the syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas dgyes pa'i h'um las 'byung ba /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas dgyes pa'i h'um las 'byung ba /
translated: The emanation and reabsorption of light rays is the chick in the belly of the syllable hūṃ.

original: sgo da bcag nas byi'u phrug tshar pa lta bu sgong skyes kyi dpal he ru ka rang snang ba'i lha mo dang / thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sgo da bcag nas byi'u phrug tshar pa lta bu sgong skyes kyi dpal he ru ka rang snang ba'i lha mo dang / thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The glorious heruka born from an egg is the self-appearing goddess, the nature of the play of compassionate passion, who is meditated on after breaking the egg.

original: de yang ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: de yang ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
translated: He has four faces, which are the four pristine consciousnesses.

original: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis dag pa'i phyag bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis dag pa'i phyag bcu gnyis pa /
translated: He has twelve arms, which are the twelve pure links of dependent origination.

original: snying rje dang shes rab kyi g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: snying rje dang shes rab kyi g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
translated: He stands with his right leg straight, which is compassion and wisdom.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: He bares his fangs of the four immeasurables.

original: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi spyan gsum /
analyzed: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi spyan gsum /
translated: He has three eyes of the three doors of liberation.

original: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rjes zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rjes zhal rnam par 'gyur ba /
translated: He has a contorted face of nonreferential compassion.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa'i phreng ba can /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa'i phreng ba can /
translated: He has a garland of skulls of the five buddhas.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug phyag rgya drug gis dpa' bo'i lus la rgyas btab pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug phyag rgya drug gis dpa' bo'i lus la rgyas btab pa /
translated: The six perfections are sealed with the six seals on the body of the hero.

original: 'khor ba dang mya nang las 'das pa 'joms pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pas /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang mya nang las 'das pa 'joms pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pas /
translated: He tramples on Kālarātri, the destroyer of the fear of samsara and nirvana.

original: sgrib pa spangs pa'i stag lpags bsnams pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa spangs pa'i stag lpags bsnams pa /
translated: He holds a tiger skin, which is the abandonment of obscurations.

original: chos nyid kyi phag mo la phyag gis 'khyud pa /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi phag mo la phyag gis 'khyud pa /
translated: He embraces the dharmatā pig.

original: phyag mtshan lhag ma ni go sla bsam bshad do //
analyzed: phyag mtshan lhag ma ni go sla bsam bshad do //
translated: The remaining hand implements are easy to understand and therefore are not explained.

original: zhal mdun ma sngo ba /
analyzed: zhal mdun ma sngo ba /
translated: The face in front is blue.

original: g-yas ser ba /
analyzed: g-yas ser ba /
translated: The right is yellow.

original: rgyab dmar ba /
analyzed: rgyab dmar ba /
translated: The back is red.

original: g-yon ljang ba /
analyzed: g-yon ljang ba /
translated: The left is green.

original: mdun ma sgeg pa /
analyzed: mdun ma sgeg pa /
translated: The face in front is smiling.

original: g-yas drag pa /
analyzed: g-yas drag pa /
translated: The right is wrathful.

original: rgyab dgod pa /
analyzed: rgyab dgod pa /
translated: The back is laughing.

original: g-yon ljags bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon ljags bskyod pa'o //
translated: The left is wagging its tongue.

original: de'i mdun du a'a li k'a li'i sgo nga las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de'i mdun du a'a li k'a li'i sgo nga las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das /
translated: In front of him is Bhagavat born from the egg of Alikāli.

original: yum ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: yum ye shes bzhi'i zhal bzhi pa /
translated: The mother has four faces of the four awarenesses.

original: tshad med pa bzhi'i phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi'i phyag bzhi pa /
translated: She has four arms of the four immeasurables.

original: rnam thar gsum gyi spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: rnam thar gsum gyi spyan gsum pa /
translated: She has three eyes of the three gates of liberation.

original: nyon mongs pa las grol ba'i dbu skra grol ba /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa las grol ba'i dbu skra grol ba /
translated: Her hair is loose, liberated from the afflictions.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pas @159a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad spangs pas @159a * //
translated: She has abandoned the eight worldly concerns.

original: gcer bu / gcig dang du ma bral ba mtshon pas dum bu'i ska rags can /
analyzed: gcer bu / gcig dang du ma bral ba mtshon pas dum bu'i ska rags can /
translated: She is naked, and her skirt of strips of cloth indicates that she is free of being one or many.

original: phyag g-yon pa'i thod pa bdud rtsi lngas gang bas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa'i thod pa bdud rtsi lngas gang bas 'chi bdag gi bdud 'joms pa /
translated: Her left hand holds a skull cup filled with the five elixirs, which conquers the demon of the lord of death.

original: g-yas kyi gri gung gis nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa /
analyzed: g-yas kyi gri gung gis nyon mongs pa'i bdud 'joms pa /
translated: Her right hand holds a flaying knife, which conquers the demon of afflictions.

original: g-yas pa'i cang te'us lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i cang te'us lha'i bu'i bdud 'joms pa /
translated: Her right hand holds a ḍamaru, which conquers the demon of the devaputra.

original: g-yon pa kha tv'am gas phung po'i bdud 'joms pa /
analyzed: g-yon pa kha tv'am gas phung po'i bdud 'joms pa /

analyzed: ba spu'i bu gnas bskal pa'i me'i gzi brjid can /

analyzed: zhal nas 'od zer dmar po khrag 'dzag pa lta bu 'phro ba /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi byin pa gnyis kyis thabs kyi ye shes la 'khyud pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can no //

analyzed: g-yas sngo ba /

original: g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi dmar po /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag bzhi dmar po /

original: yang bzhi ljang khu /
analyzed: yang bzhi ljang khu /

original: nang gi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //

original: ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsgom zhe na /

analyzed: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /

analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas 'khyud pa bsam mo //

analyzed: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /

original: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
analyzed: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
translated: The hero holds a vajra and a bell,

original: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /
analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /

analyzed: aa las ltag par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen ma sngon mo /

original: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
analyzed: dpa' bo rdo rje dang dril bu /
translated: the hero holds a vajra and a bell,

original: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa'o //
translated: and the heroine holds a flaying knife and skull cup.

analyzed: de bzhin du go las rna ba g-yon par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: ra las smin ma'i dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
translated: From ra in the center of the eyebrows, in the center of a sun maṇḍala,

original: de las mig gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de las mig gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

original: ma las phrag pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil @159b 'khor /
analyzed: ma las phrag pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil @159b 'khor /

analyzed: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni snga ma bzhin no //

analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa ni gdul bya lha btul ba dang lha dang dri za btul ba'i ming gis btags /

analyzed: ka las mchan khung gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la myu gu can dang sa srung ma la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo thams cad dmar mo /
translated: From ka, at the two armpits, on sun maṇḍalas, are all the heroes and yoginīs such as Aṅkura and Dharaṇī, red.

original: dpa' bo padma dang dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo padma dang dril bu bsnams pas 'khyud pa /

original: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /
analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la /

analyzed: aom las nu ma gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
translated: From oṃ, at the two breasts, on sun maṇḍalas, are the heroes and yoginīs as before.

original: zhing ni sa gsum pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: zhing ni sa gsum pa'i snang ba'o //

analyzed: tri las lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //

analyzed: ko las sna rtser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
translated: From ko, at the tip of the nose, is a sun maṇḍala, with heroes and yoginīs as before.

original: nye ba'i zhing gi sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i zhing gi sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //

original: ka las lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: ka las lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

original: la las mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshando ha sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: la las mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor tshando ha sa lnga pa'i snang ba'o //

original: ka las snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: ka las snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

original: hi las rgyu zhabs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: hi las rgyu zhabs su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

original: nye ba'i tshando ha sa drug pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i tshando ha sa drug pa'i snang ba'o //

analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo 'dul byed sa la spyod pa gnod sbyin dang srin po btul ba'o //

analyzed: pre las mtshan ma la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dpa' bo stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can dkar bo /

original: dpa' bo 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa /
translated: The hero holds a wheel and a bell.

original: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a las 'khyud pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a las 'khyud pa'o //
translated: The heroine embraces him with a flaying knife and a skull cup.

original: gri las bshang sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: gri las bshang sgor nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: From gri, a sun maṇḍala on the anus.

original: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The hero and heroine are as before.

original: 'dus pa can sa bdun pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa can sa bdun pa'i snang ba'o //

original: so las brla gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: so las brla gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

original: su las byin pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: su las byin pa gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: From su, sun maṇḍalas in the two calves.

original: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo snga ma bzhin no //

original: nye ba'i 'dus pas brgyad pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i 'dus pas brgyad pa'i snang ba'o //

analyzed: na las rkang pa'i sor mo kun la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

analyzed: ku las pus mo gnyis su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /

analyzed: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dkar mo / dpa' bo 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa /

analyzed: dpa' mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas 'khyud pa / nye ba'i dur khrod @160a * //

original: ni sa bcu pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: ni sa bcu pa'i snang ba'o //
translated: The nearby charnel grounds are the appearance of the tenth stage.

original: sku'i 'khor lo ni 'dul byed /
analyzed: sku'i 'khor lo ni 'dul byed /

original: sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang lha ma yin gdul bya'o //
analyzed: sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang lha ma yin gdul bya'o //
translated: The nāgas and asuras who dwell below the earth are to be tamed.

original: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis thams cad kyang /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lha mo bcu gnyis thams cad kyang /
translated: All twelve goddesses, such as the dakini, and so on,

original: gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs pa sku mdog snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs pa sku mdog snga ma bzhin no //

original: gnas ni rgyud nas gsal lo //
analyzed: gnas ni rgyud nas gsal lo //
translated: The locations are clear in the tantra.

original: bum pa dang byang chub kyi sems thod pa ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang byang chub kyi sems thod pa ni smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'o //

original: nye bsnyen no //
analyzed: nye bsnyen no //
translated: This is the near-accomplishment stage.

analyzed: mam las lto ba chu'i dkyil 'khor la gsod byed ma gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa /

analyzed: bam las lte ba me'i dkyil 'khor la 'gugs byed ma dmar mo gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa /

analyzed: ham las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas su gar gyi dbang phyug ma gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa ljang khu /
translated: From haṃ, at the secret place, on a wind mandala, is green Queen of Dance, holding a flaying knife and a skull cup, arisen from haṃ.

analyzed: kham las mgo bo nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la padma'i dra ba can gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pa sngon mo //

original: phung po lnga dang dbang po drug ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: phung po lnga dang dbang po drug ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The five aggregates and six sense powers are as before.

original: snying gar h'um las yid mi 'khrugs pa thugs kyi 'khor lo //
analyzed: snying gar h'um las yid mi 'khrugs pa thugs kyi 'khor lo //
translated: At the heart, from HUM, is Akshobhya, the mind wheel.

analyzed: dag gi a'a: las lkog mar tshe dpag med gsung gi 'khor lo //
translated: At the throat, from A, is Amitayus, the speech wheel.

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa ser po //
translated: From OM VAM, at the throat, is yellow Vairochana, holding a wheel and a bell.

original: gar gyi dbang phyug padma dang dril bu bsnams pa dmar po //
analyzed: gar gyi dbang phyug padma dang dril bu bsnams pa dmar po //
translated: From OM GAM, at the head, is red Natha, holding a lotus and a bell.🔽From OM JAM, at the heart, is blue Heruka, holding a vajra and a bell.

original: he ru ka rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa mthing ga / nyi ma rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa ser po /
analyzed: he ru ka rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa mthing ga / nyi ma rin po che dang dril bu bsnams pa ser po /
translated: From OM MAM, at the throat, is yellow Surya, holding a jewel and a bell.

analyzed: rta mchog sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa ljang gu /

analyzed: phag mo la sogs pa lha mo drug ni thams cad kyang gri gug dang ka p'a la bsnams pas g-yas brkyang pa'o // phag mo dmar mo //
translated: The six goddesses such as Vārāhī are all red, holding a flaying knife and skull cup, standing with right leg straight.🔽Vārāhī is red.

original: gshin rje ma ser mo //🔽rmongs byed ma dkar mo //
analyzed: gshin rje ma ser mo // rmongs byed ma dkar mo //
translated: Yama is yellow.🔽Moharā is white.

original: skyod byed ma sngon mo //
analyzed: skyod byed ma sngon mo //
translated: Cāmuṇḍā is blue.

original: skrag byed ma du ba'i mdog can /
analyzed: skrag byed ma du ba'i mdog can /
translated: Bhīma is the color of smoke.

original: tsandi ka dmar mo //
analyzed: tsandi ka dmar mo //
translated: Caṇḍī is red.

original: de ltar go cha bskon nas /
analyzed: de ltar go cha bskon nas /
translated: Having thus donned the armor,

original: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya ni go sla'o //
translated: the mudra for inviting the awareness beings is easy to understand.

original: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan pa'i phyag rgya dang / mig gyen du blta ba dang / nag pheem gyi sgra sgrogs pa ste bzhi dang / snying ga'i @160b padma dang zla ba'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo bcu byon pa la /
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan pa'i phyag rgya dang / mig gyen du blta ba dang / nag pheem gyi sgra sgrogs pa ste bzhi dang / snying ga'i @160b padma dang zla ba'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor lo bcu byon pa la /
translated: The four are the mudra of pressing the right foot with the left, looking upward, the sound of phaim, and the samadhi of light rays radiating from the hum on the moon in the lotus at the heart.

original: phyag 'tshal ba dang / bstod pa dang / mchod pa byas nas 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus dgug pa dang / zhags pas gtso po 'khor la gzhug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis tha mi dad par bcing ba dang / dril bus dam tshig sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba dang / bstod pa dang / mchod pa byas nas 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus dgug pa dang / zhags pas gtso po 'khor la gzhug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis tha mi dad par bcing ba dang / dril bus dam tshig sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par dbang du bya'o //
translated: Having made prostrations, praises, and offerings, one should summon with light rays like hooks, one should cause the principal one to enter the retinue with a noose, one should bind inseparably with a chain, and one should enthrall the pledge beings and the awareness beings as inseparable with a bell.

original: yang snga ma bzhin du lus ngag yid gsum gyi phyag rgyas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor mas bskor ba'i dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ldan nam mkha'i dbyings su rnam snang dkar po //
analyzed: yang snga ma bzhin du lus ngag yid gsum gyi phyag rgyas dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor mas bskor ba'i dbang bskur ba'i 'khor lo ldan nam mkha'i dbyings su rnam snang dkar po //
translated: Again, as before, one should visualize the wheel of empowerment endowed with the heroes and yoginīs surrounded by the mudras of body, speech, and mind in the realm of space.🔽The wheel of Vairocana is white,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi 'khor lo ser po //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi 'khor lo ser po //
translated: the wheel of Ratnasaṃbhava is yellow,🔽the wheel of Akṣobhya is blue,

original: mi bskyod pa'i 'khor lo mthing ga / snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'khor lo dmar po //🔽don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo ljang gus gang bar bltas la /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i 'khor lo mthing ga / snang ba mtha' yas kyi 'khor lo dmar po //🔽don yod grub pa'i 'khor lo ljang gus gang bar bltas la /
translated: the wheel of Amitābha is red,🔽and the wheel of Amoghasiddhi is green.

original: sangs rgyas spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang / kun du bzang mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma'i lha mo lnga thugs ka nas phyung nas bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dang / thod pas spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi chus dri ma bkrus nas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas spyan dang / m'a ma k'i dang / kun du bzang mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma'i lha mo lnga thugs ka nas phyung nas bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dang / thod pas spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyi chus dri ma bkrus nas dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
translated: Having brought forth from his heart the five goddesses of Buddha Eye, Mamaki, Samantabhadri, Pandara, and Tara, he imagines that they confer the empowerment with the vase and skull-cup filled with the five nectars, and that the water of the vajra particles washes away the stains from the crown of his head down to his feet.

original: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad ni go sla'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs bcad ni go sla'o //
translated: The verse of empowerment is easy to understand.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka h'um zhes pa ni /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka h'um zhes pa ni /
translated: Om sarva tathagata abhisheka hum.

original: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags te /
analyzed: chu'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags te /
translated: This is the mantra for the empowerment of water.

original: rtags ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rtags ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: The sign is the five-pointed vajra.

original: sa ma ya h'um zhes pas yab yum lnga'i mkha' gsang nas byang chub sems kha dog dkar dmar lce la bab pas sgyu mar rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / dbang rtags ni lkog mar tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu 'bur ba'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya h'um zhes pas yab yum lnga'i mkha' gsang nas byang chub sems kha dog dkar dmar lce la bab pas sgyu mar rtogs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / dbang rtags ni lkog mar tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu 'bur ba'o //
translated: The signs are the Brahma sound at the throat and the hair coil between the eyebrows.

original: shr'i ye h'um zhes bya bas shes rab ye shes kyi sngags te /
analyzed: shr'i ye h'um zhes bya bas shes rab ye shes kyi sngags te /
translated: With śrīye hūṃ, the mantra of the gnosis of the wisdom consort empowerment,

original: lha mo lnga dang rang gi lha mo la zhugs pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / spyi gtsug gyen du 'bur ba ste rtags so //
analyzed: lha mo lnga dang rang gi lha mo la zhugs pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / spyi gtsug gyen du 'bur ba ste rtags so //
translated: one enters into union with the five goddesses and one's own goddess. The signs are the disappearance of the genitals into a sheath and the hair coil on the crown of the head.

original: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should partake of the elixir.

original: 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
analyzed: 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
translated: Below, from yaṃ, is a wind mandala marked with pennants.

original: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum me 'od kyis mtshan pa /
analyzed: ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum me 'od kyis mtshan pa /
translated: From raṃ, a triangular fire mandala is marked with flames.

original: aa las byung ba'i ka p'a la rgya che ba bsams la /
analyzed: aa las byung ba'i ka p'a la rgya che ba bsams la /
translated: From aḥ, one should imagine a vast kapāla.

original: de'i nang du dbus su mu dang h'um las bee d'u rya lta bu'i gong bu /
analyzed: de'i nang du dbus su mu dang h'um las bee d'u rya lta bu'i gong bu /
translated: In the center of that, from mu and hūṃ, is a ball of light like beryl.

original: shar du bi dang bhr'um las shel lta bu'i gong bu /
analyzed: shar du bi dang bhr'um las shel lta bu'i gong bu /
translated: In the east, from vi and bhruṃ, is a crystal-like sphere.

original: lho ru ra dang aom las gser btsom lta bu'i gong bu /
analyzed: lho ru ra dang aom las gser btsom lta bu'i gong bu /
translated: In the south, from ra and oṃ, is a sphere like refined gold.
